General_Description: '''Turning Tides''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra found the riddle at the [[Sea Captain Dock]].
Section_Riddle: ''If the seas are not to your favor, seek out a trident. The biggest one is in [[Korinth]], being held by the [[Statue of Poseidon, Korinthia|Statue]] of [[Poseidon]]. You will find me there on one of its prongs.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
